lemma "no_spoofing TYPE('pkt_ext) [Iface ''eth0'' \<mapsto> [(ipv4addr_of_dotdecimal (192,168,0,0), 24)]] [Rule (MatchAnd (MatchNot (Match (Src (IpAddrNetmask (ipv4addr_of_dotdecimal (192,168,0,0)) 24)))) (MatchAnd (Match (IIface (Iface ''eth0''))) (Match (Prot (Proto TCP))))) action.Drop, Rule (MatchAnd (MatchNot (Match (Src (IpAddrNetmask (ipv4addr_of_dotdecimal (192,168,0,0)) 24)))) (MatchAnd (Match (IIface (Iface ''eth0''))) (MatchNot (Match (Prot (Proto TCP)))))) action.Drop, Rule MatchAny action.Accept]" (is "no_spoofing TYPE('pkt_ext) ?ipassmt ?rs")
